verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> waxed old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in age. <S%H3117><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for their elders, <S%H2205><s%> and for their heads, <S%H7218><s%> and for their judges, <S%H8199><s%> and for their officers, <S%H7860><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, I <S%H589><s%> am old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in age: <S%H3117><s%>

And ye <S%H859><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you; for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he <S%H1931><s%> that hath fought <S%H3898><s%> for you.

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have divided unto you by lot <S%H5307><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> that remain, <S%H7604><s%> to be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have cut off, <S%H3772><s%> even unto the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> westward. <S%H3996><s%> <S%H8121><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall expel <S%H1920><s%> them from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and drive <S%H3423><s%> them from out of your sight; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath promised <S%H1696><s%> unto you.

Be ye therefore very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H2388><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> that ye turn <S%H5493><s%> not <S%H1115><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> therefrom <S%H4480><s%> to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left; <S%H8040><s%>

That ye come <S%H935><s%> not <S%H1115><s%> among these <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> these <S%H428><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you; neither <S%H3808><s%> make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods, <S%H430><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> cause to swear <S%H7650><s%> by them, neither <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them, nor <S%H3808><s%> bow yourselves <S%H7812><s%> unto them:

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as <S%H834><s%> ye have done <S%H6213><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath driven out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and strong: <S%H6099><s%> but as for you, <S%H859><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> hath been able to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand: <S%H505><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> it is that fighteth <S%H3898><s%> for you, as <S%H834><s%> he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> you.
Take good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> therefore unto yourselves, <S%H5315><s%> that ye love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Else <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H518><s%> ye do in any wise go back, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%> and cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> even these <S%H428><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%> among <S%H854><s%> you, and shall make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them, and go in <S%H935><s%> unto them, and they <S%H1992><s%> to you:

Know for a certainty <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any of <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall be <S%H1961><s%> snares <S%H6341><s%> and traps <S%H4170><s%> unto you, and scourges <S%H7850><s%> in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and thorns <S%H6976><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> ye perish <S%H6><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you.

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am going <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and ye know <S%H3045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> your souls, <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> hath failed <S%H5307><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> you; all <S%H3605><s%> are come to pass <S%H935><s%> unto you, and not <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> hath failed <S%H5307><s%> thereof. <S%H4480><s%>

Therefore it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that as <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> you; so <S%H3651><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you.

When ye have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, and have gone <S%H1980><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and bowed yourselves <S%H7812><s%> to them; then shall the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and ye shall perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath given <S%H5414><s%> unto you.
